::Spears::

She looked at them. "OK. Go outside and help Shadow Wing weld the 
hull back to together. Or at least do what you can. this ship needs 
all the help it can get."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> (Sorry Alloran, didn't know. And I thought I had something to tell 
> KSLaw, but I forgot.)
> 
> Fliq and Bronco watched Spears walks away from them, and talked 
with 
> others. They were confused, but ran back up to her.
> 
> "My namie is Fliq, and this is Bronco. We brought back the pods 
with 
> Ramulus.(DID Ramulus bring them back while I was gone? If they 
didn't 
> tell me, so I can scratch everything I did and wait for Yanshosh to 
> come back.) We know your name because Ramulus told us the story 
about 
> the attack you guys suffered when getting the pod. We thought you 
had 
> seen us arrive. We knew this was you because we heard somebody call 
> the other bird-like bot Shadow-Wing. So, we're friendly and all we 
> want to do is get some parts for the ship. It'll never fly again, 
of 
> course, but it will make it almost impermiable. So what do you say?"
> 
> (In the future we might have a big task. When we finaly finish this 
> story and get ready to start the next, we have to leave everything 
as 
> the way it was for G1, meaning we'd have to find someway of getting 
> The Ark to the volcano. I know it's probably years from now, but I 
> like pointing out the obvious.)
> 
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> 
> 
> Vulois looked at the three new bots, and agve them their 
assignement.
> 
> "From now on, you three will be known as The Peace Angels. You will 
> protect the embassy at all costs. It must nto fall to any attacks. 
In 
> a few days, Windrazor and I are going to the Alliance base. You 
will 
> stay here and defend. Now come in, and I will give you a tour."
